Episode 150 Guest: Benjamin Harding

28 Sep 2020 | 0 Comments

In this episode we talk to Benjamin Harding about the fact that being a developer is more the coding.

Benjamin Harding

Benjamin works as the Crash Reporting and Real User Monitoring Team Lead at RayGun in New Zealand. Ben is a Web Developer with a passion for user focused design and helping others achieve success.
